articles.title: Christopher Nolan Takes Top DGA Award For ‘Oppenheimer’ Paving Way To Oscar - Deadline
articles.description: DGA Awards: Christopher Nolan Wins Outstanding Directorial Achievement in Theatrical Feature Film for 'Oppenheimer'
articles.content:
Oppenheimer‘s steamroll of awards season continued with filmmaker Christopher Nolan walking off with the Outstanding Directorial Achievement in Theatrical Feature Film. 
The fifth time was the charm… [+2877 chars]
